runs.comm: some swing for Anderson straightaway as this is defended by Tamim
tucks away the bowler behind of square on the leg side to get off the mark
now picks up a couple through sweeper cover as Bangladesh look to rotate strike
and Anderson has plucked one early for England as he gets one across the left-hander, who ends up feeding an outside edge to the third slip, who is able to snaffle this comfortably
short of a length and defended away towards the off side by Sarkar
gets this one to nip away on a back of a length as this carries quite well to the keeper, with the batsman playing inside of the line of the delivery
pitches up on and around off as this is driven away towards mid-off
short of a length which swings away outside of off to the keeper
the keeper and slip cordon seemed excited for a caught behind, but not Broad, as this length delivery gets through
dropped gets an outside edge to this fuller one which shapes away outside of off as Jordan is unable to hold on to this chance to his left at third slip. Lucky break for Bangladesh there
imperious drive through the covers by Sarkar as he gets away a boundary in elegant fashion
defended off the back foot now to end Broad's first over

Anderson is the man in Adelaide as he succeeds at once again finding the outside edge, this time of Tamim's bat as he pushed at this back of a length which shaped away. This time it goes to second slip, who takes it comfortably in the end. Superb start for England as Bangladesh go two down early in the piece
gets away a single straightaway through backward square, which will certainly help steady his nerves
avoids this leg-side steepler from Anderson, with the bowler looking to get him on the back foot
now defends away the slightly back of a length delivery towards the off side
this time gets in the inswinger, bowling in a fourth stump channel, as this nips in off the pitch to carry beautifully to Buttler behind

now it is Broad who has got Bangladesh a bit unhinged as he finds the leading edge of this attempted push off the back foot through mid-on, with this one flying over backward point, but importantly, away from any fielders
fires in a back of a length outside of off which is allowed to go through to the keeper
defends away this back of a length to the off side as Bangladesh look to survive these hostile few overs
short of a length and slanting down leg now as Mahmudullah is able to get away a clip through midwicket to bring Sarkar on strike. Called leg bye as there was no bat on it in the end
too full and attacking the stumps as Sarkar squeezes this one out in front of mid-off
content to keep out this fuller length on middle and leg as he re-directs it away to the leg side
prods forward to keep out this length delivery from Anderson on off stump
withdraws the blade to this one wobbling outside of off stump
is well late on this attempted pull through midwicket as the ball climbs over the bat to the keeper
length delivery outside of off which is respected by the batsman
delivers one outside of off which is bunted away towards the off side
fuller length delivery which is fired through outside of off as Sarkar shoulders arms
tucks away a single off the pads square off the wicket on the leg side
has found a lovely length outside of off as this moves away as Mahmudullah has a go. Looks to be pushing up everything outside that channel
a bit of fortune for this attempted push to this full length delivery outside his off peg, as this one flies away through where a traditional gully would have stood to find the third man boundary
negotiates away this length delivery through midwicket, but doesn't seek the single
eases away this length haring on the pads towards the leg side
gets struck on the body after reading the swing late on this length delivery on and around leg stump
pushes at this length delivery going across him as this ends up close on the leg side, with Anderson fielding the ball
steers away this fractionally short ball from Anderson through backward point as he used the pace well enough for this to get to the rope
similar length as before, this time going more across the batsman, as he gets away the inside-edge through backward square
length delivery well wide of off which is fended away by the batsman
leg-side shaping delivery which is helped down fine leg for a single
short of a length which is guided away through to the slips to end the over
pitches the ball up outside of off as Mahmudullah is enticed into the drive, with no movement of the feet on show whatsoever
guides away a brace now through long on as Broad strayed on a middle to off-line
tries to crash away this short of a length outside his off stump, but there simply wasn't enough width for the stroke, as the ball doesn't get away too far
this time forces away a drive through cover point, but is held by the fielder within the ring
has a push at this length delivery outside off to only eventually find the man at cover
fuller length which is tucked away through midwicket as Mahmudullah retains the strike
defends away this fuller length towards the off side
gets some movement into the batsman of a slightly back of a length, with this one catching the inside-edge of this attempt drive to find a boundary through fine leg. Really unlucky there for Anderson
a touch shorter now, except this one doesn't shape in as much, with the batsman jabbing this away towards the off side
length delivery outside off which gets good carry on the way to the keeper. Also nibbled away as it flew through in the channel
forces away a drive just behind square, but the man at backward point is able to pounce on it comfortably
keeps out this back of a length which gets appreciable lateral movement into him as he defended
begins with a fuller length, going across the left-hander, as he has a waft at it, with the ball nibbling away
now gets this one completely wrong down the leg side as the umpire signals to the scorers
looking to clip away this fuller one through midwicket, but ends up getting a slight leading edge over towards mid-off
another one which strays down the leg side as Jordan is penalised by the umpire
strikes away this fuller length through the covers, but short cover point is all over this
gets away the expansive drive to this fuller length going across, but ends up hitting a bit too straight to the deepish mid-off fielder
nicely behind the line of this length delivery going across him
and once again defended from his back foot to end a rather mixed first over from Jordan
shortish length which he tries to dispatch through midwicket, but is early on the delivery as it continues through to the keeper
punches away this length delivery gracefully through cover point as the batsmen complete a brace
straying on the pads now as he is able to just guide this past the dive from mid-on to pickup two more
steers away this length delivery outside of off towards third man
shimmies down before unleashing a pull to this shortish length on leg, but is unable to middle this
now looks to penetrate through the covers, but picks out one of the close-in fielders
slaps away this short, wide delivery through sweeper cover as the short boundary is met with ease
now tickles away some runs through fine leg, with Hales putting in fine work in the region to cut off a potential boundary
full, and in the slot, as Sarkar shows his class with a crisp drive through cover point, with the two fielders chasing it not having a chance
the Bangladesh fifty comes up thanks to this elegant cover drive which almost finds the deep extra-cover boundary. A sight for sore eyes is Sarkar!
gets this back of a length off his hips through backward square now
tries to glance away this back of a length off his hips, but gets the timing slightly wrong
defends away this length offering from Woakes outside of off, who looks to settle into a happy rhythm
now delivers a half-volley which Mahmudullah fails to punish as he ends up locating the man at cover point
tries to ease away a drive through mid-on, but the fielder is able to take care of it
too full and straying on middle and leg as this is clipped away towards deep midwicket
looks for the glance away square off the wicket, but doesn't quite time it so
short delivery going down leg as the keeper and Woakes feign an appeal for caught behind
bullet drive from Sarkar, who really looks to be ratcheting up slowly through the gears, as he gets away this fuller length going across through deep extra-cover
flighted slowly on off as this is respected by the batsman
clips away this one sliding down middle and leg through backward square. Bangladesh can play spin all day, so let's see how long this move shapes up for
drags the length a touch as he goes round the wicket to the left-hander, with this one cut away towards backward point
now forces away a drive through the covers to get off the strike
back over the wicket now as this one is helped down with the angle through fine leg, just beating the clutches of the leg slip close on the batsman's heels
reverts to round the wicket as he ends up dishing a slider down leg, which is wided by the umpire
negotiates this final delivery with aplomb as the ball rolls away to the leg side
carts away this length delivery outside of off, but did not time this at all, as it finds its way to mid-on

calculated risk from Mahmudullah which comes off to a tee as he advances down the track, putting the bowler off his length as he drags this down for the batsman to club away over the cow corner boundary for a flat six
now blazes away this overpitched length outside of off towards extra-cover
swinging delivery on the pads which is clipped away to the leg side by the batsman
shortish length which is nurdled away on the leg side, but he can't find the vacant space for the run
full and on the pads as this is eased away behind of square for one
comes down the track and works it to short mid-wicket, but for no purchase
defends this one away from within the confines of his crease
looks for the sweep behind of square, which he is able to accomplish as he heads down to the other end
sends away an aerial push off the back foot towards backward point, but luckily for him this lands before it could reach him on the full
defended away to the leg side now
tries to force away a punch through midwicket, but ends up hitting it a bit finer towards the short backward square fielder

mix-up length delivery on the pads which he failed to get away as the non-striker backed up a mile before being sent back when the run wasn't on offer. Square-leg pounces on this before firing in a throw at the non-striker's, with the batsman doing well to make his ground in the end. Would have been disastrous if that had struck
picks up a single with a slap through sweeper cover
oozes class as he finesses a drive on the up off the back foot through backward point to get this past the converging fielder from third man
now eases away a run onto the leg side as they rotate the strike
back of a length which is inside-edged onto the pads by the batsman
defends away this back of a length softly to the leg side
flatter from Ali as Sarkar rocks back and punches it back to the bowler
pushed through on middle and leg as Sarkar pushes it towards midwicket
short and slightly wide outside off as Sarkar hangs back and cuts it towards backward point, but can't beat the fielder

did that carry? It didn't carry as the ball bounces just in front of the fielder as this was floated up outside off, with Sarkar pushing at it with an open face. He ends up getting an outside edge that bounces in front of the slip fielder and goes through his hands, with the batsmen taking two
has been a cut above today as he hammers this fractionally short length over cow corner for a huge six. Looking threatening here for England
flighted delivery just outside off which Sarkar pushes off the front foot, picking the cover fielder in the end
picks up a single through sweeper cover to get off the strike
bangs in a shorter one which has the left-hander ducking for cover. Called one for the over
glides away a single now through backward square as he saunters to the other end
slices away square off the wicket on the off side to bring Sarkar on strike
goes round the wicket as this back of a length is defended away off the back foot
tests him with another bouncer which somehow is gone unpunished as the umpire calls over
tries to tuck away a single behind of square, but no can do
forces away a clip through backward square to get to the other end
defended away to the off side by the batsman
drills away Ali through extra-cover for a single
turned away off the back foot through square leg for another comfortable run
eases away a run through midwicket to end the over
mirrors his start from the first spell as he streaks in a wide across the batsman
delivers this from wide of the crease as the angle finds the batsman's off stump, who is able to defend this away

and the move has worked for England as Jordan succeeds in nipping out the promising Sarkar, as the bowler delivers a skiddy, short ball delivered from wide of the wicket, which the batsman was looking to avoid as he ducked away, but he could not remove his glove from the equation in time as the ball catches the glove on the way to Buttler behind. Big blow for Bangladesh as these two looked quite settled out there
goes back over the wicket as he delivers a bumper which Shakib has no interest in engaging with
short on leg stump and Shakib, who really did not need to take this risk, is hurried into a hook which he is lucky not to fly over to the backward square fielder in place
gets away a drive off the back foot through towards cover
full on the pads as this is clipped away to the man at short mid-on to end a good over for England
nurdles away a single through the leg side
goes round the wicket to Shakib as this slightly short length is eased away through third man
shimmies down before forcing away this drive past the dive of mid-on to find the long on fielder
struck away towards the point fielder by Shakib

and in the softest of ways Shakib has to depart from the middle after feeding an edge to the slip to this one drifting in from outside off, before just turning away. Can't believe he didn't see the slip right behind, as this one lands right in the big buckets of the fielder. Really poor choice of shot for Shakib there
gets in a good stride to cover for the turn of this Moeen special
short of a length outside off which is French cut by the batsman as he attempted the slap through the covers
defends this back of a length comfortably off the back foot
slaps away this short of a length to the fielder at cover, but can't find a run
now carves away a drive through extra-cover to pinch a single
slanting delivery down the pads which is tucked away behind of square by the batsman
in the slot as he goes for the drive through the covers, as Mahmudullah is able to get to his fifty despite pressure from the throw at his end
tries to punch Ali away through long on, but ends up finding mid-on instead
now forces away a drive to the left of the bowler, but Ali is able to pounce on it comfortably
tries once more to get past Morgan at mid-on, but he is equal to the task
is slightly early into this attempted clip through the leg side as the ball catches the leading edge, but falls safely at where mid-off would have stood
picks up a run square off the wicket to get to the other end
comes down before re-directing the ball away to the close-in fielder on the leg side
rushes him onto the back foot as this is glanced away behind of square
fails to get away this clip off the pads through the leg side, as leg bye is called
tries him out with a shorter one which has Mushfiqur ducking under
tries to force away a punch through mid-off, but to no avail
fends this back of a length off the back foot through the leg side to get to the other end

fantastic shot! It was a touch fuller and outside off as Mahmudullah is able to get on top of the bounce and drive it past cover, who dives to his left but can't stop the ball, with this running away to the boundary
and he is greeted to the crease with a hard cut through point as he offers up enough width for this to be dispatched comfortably
now sensibly defends this next one back to the bowler himself
avoids this short ball on middle and leg fired in from Broad
fails to get away the attempted pull through cow corner
another short delivery which the batsman decides to duck to
picks up a couple through long on to end Broad's first over of his second spell
is quite late on this attempted pull over midwicket as he delivers yet another crossed-seam bouncer
jabs away at this short of a length outside his off stump, but picks out the close-in fielder
flashes at this length delivery outside of off as he offered limited foot movement as he went after it

Mahmudullah able to release some pressure after the failed attempt of the previous ball as he gets away with a top-edge to this hook over long leg, with the ball having enough on it to just get over the rope
short of a length now on middle and leg which is tucked away behind of square
unleashes a drive to this fuller one well wide of off, but locates the man at point straightaway
full delivery on middle and off which is flicked away towards the leg side
cuts away this length offering from Broad towards the sweeper at deep cover
shortish length outside off as Mushfiqur seemed to have all the time in the world as he dabbed this away through third man for a boundary
this time withdraws the blade to this slightly back of a length outside of off
short again and pulled away towards midwicket for a single
not at all interested to engage with this short of a length which shapes away upon pitching
able to glide away a couple through third man to this first one from Woakes
gets in a stride before working this away towards mid-off
turns away a single to the leg side to get Mahmudullah on the hot seat
defends this one pitched up on middle and off as he picks out the bowler in his follow through
has a go at this length delivery outside of off, but is late on it as it travels through to Buttler
fires in a yorker which is dig out towards mid-on
and begins with a dragged length pitched wide of off which is cut away square off the wicket
tries to ease this past the man at short mid-on, but to no avail
dragged on middle and leg as this is punched away towards long on
able to clip away a run behind of square as these two continue to rotate the strike
backs away before trying to steer this past the point fielder, but Jordan does well to stop this from getting to the rope with a dive to his left
this time pierces the gap he failed to pick the previous ball, with Jordan, now at sweeper cover, coming round to field this before the rope
bunts away this back of a length towards the off side
lifts this length delivery on middle and leg, but doesn't get enough oomph behind it as it falls away around long on
pitches this one up on and around off as this is struck back to him in his follow through
goes for the release option, this time over midwicket, but there is a man in the deep stationed there
defends away this length delivery outside his off stump with soft hands
looks to get away a drive through cover, with short mid-off doing well to get some hand on this after putting in a dive, with the ball eventually fielded at extra-cover

gets in a good stride to this one flighted in and drifting away outside of off as the ball bounces past the outside edge of the drive. Looked like he may have overbalanced too much as the bails were removed behind, but he is safe
defended by the batsman
able to pinch a single behind of square on the leg side
goes for the slog-sweep over cow corner which is met with great enthusiasm from the Bangladeshi ranks in the crowd
sensibly nurdles away a run through the leg side to get to the other end and cool off
struck away to a wide long on to end the over
carts away this length delivery towards midwicket as Bangladesh reach 150
safely negotiates this back of a length outside of off
cuts away this back of a length outside of off through the covers
gets away a drive on the up towards the covers, but can't locate the space
once again defends this calmly to the off side
drilled straight to the man at silly mid-off to end the over
cuts away this fractionally short length from Ali which drifts in on middle, as he finds backward point, who takes a shy at the non-striker's when he sees him struggle through slightly for the run
now picks up a single behind of square on the leg side
turns this flighted delivery around off stump and shouts a loud 'No' when the single was proposed
gets away a back foot punch through the covers, with this reined in by the boundary rider
gets the single down to long on now
picks up a single through square-leg
begins with a length delivery outside of off which is run down to third man
looks to carve away the bowler through the covers now, but only picks up the one
defends away this one on middle and leg to the man at mid-on
short of a length which is fended away with soft hands on the off side, with the batsman keen on the run before seeing the close-in fielder haring in on the ball
in the slot and driven competently towards the cover fielder
shortish length slanting on the pads which is worked away by Mushfiqur close to the body
and from ball one he is ready to go as he backs away a touch before sending this fuller length over deep extra-cover with a well-timed tonk
looking to go inside-out now over long off to this fuller delivery, but picks out the man at mid-off
tries to steer away a run past backward point, but to no avail
shortish length straying on the pads which is helped away off the hips through backward square
able to work away a run now down through fine leg
safely behind the line of this back of a length as this is played away to the backward point fielder
full delivery which is timed away on the up through backward point
gets away a single through deep cover with ease
now works away a single with a push through mid-on
fetches this fuller delivery from outside off before sweeping this away powerfully through square-leg to find the boundary. Wonderful improvisation from Mushfiqur!
employs his back foot defence to good effect to this length delivery outside off
gets a gift in the slot which he caresses away through deep extra-cover, but can't beat the eventual dive from the fielder chasing after it before the rope
slower delivery which is flicked away behind of square on the leg side
pulled away competently off the back foot, but straight to the short midwicket fielder
tries to glide away a single through backward point, but locates the fielder soon after
jabs away a single to deep point as the batsmen exchange ends
clips away this full length through midwicket for one
straying on the pads as this is tickled away through to deep fine leg
Mahmudullah goes leg-side and tries to pull, but gets it on the inside half of the bat as it rolls away to backward square-leg
eases away this length delivery towards square-leg
fires in a yorker now which is dug away towards the man at mid-on
full delivery, and well wide of off, as the bowler is penalised by the umpire
fires in another yorker which Mahmudullah is late on as he gets hit on the pads. Goes for the appeal, but this was always sliding down leg
tries to time away a single through the off side, but doesn't quite get it away
digs in another yorker which the batsman is able to get down to long on in the end after digging it out
starts with a short delivery on middle and leg which is pulled away through long leg to move into the 90s
slipping down the pads once more as Mahmudullah gets through for a comfortable single after tickling this one away behind of square
fuller delivery on middle and leg which is flicked away to the deep backward square fielder
slams this fuller one over midwicket as he gets to a well-deserved fifty. He also becomes the first Bangladeshi batsman to score three fifties in one World Cup.
picks up a brace with a clip behind through backward square
keeps the strike for the next over with a stroke through to midwicket
short ball on leg stump which is hooked away to the boundary rider at deep backward square
tries to go for the old dab-and-run outside his off stump, but doesn't quite get it away
gets away a single through third man to bring up their 100-run stand. Has been a fine performance so far from these two batsmen
looks to back away to create room through the off side, with the bowler following him as he slipped in the yorker. Called leg bye in the end after he failed to get bat on ball
Mahmudullah now becomes the highest individual scorer for a Bangladeshi batsman in World Cup cricket with this outside edge through third man. Fortunate as there were no fielders in the cordon
short of length delivery just outside off stump as Mahmudullah defends off the back foot
opts for the slog-sweep straightaway as he is unable to get this all the way to the cow corner boundary

comes down a touch before striking away to the extra-cover fielder to get Mahmudullah back on the hot seat. He is on 96, and within a blow of becoming the first Bangladeshi batsman to score a World Cup ton
content to just milk the single down long on as he goes up to 97

what happened here? A routine sweep from this leg-side delivery from Ali somehow makes its way to the deep backward square boundary as the man at fine leg fails to pick this early enough. Must have lost it in the sun, I suppose?
picks up a single on the leg side to rotate the strike
keeps the strike as he eases this one down to long on to end the over
gets away a clip through the leg side to get to 99. Looks calm as he can be out there
Mushfiqur targets deep midwicket with a club which finds its way to the boundary
good length delivery on the off stump which Mushfiqur defends with ease
dishes up a juicy full toss outside off which is slapped away through the vacant extra-cover region for four more
follows the batsman with one tailing in full  on leg stump
clears the front leg as he looked to dispatch over midwicket, but ends up hitting squarer towards the boundary rider on the rope
shuffles a bit in his crease before dabbing this away late through backward point
and it almost looked as if he had achieved it with a clip to the leg side before being sent back by the close-in fielder

and a misfield through backward point ushers in history as Mahmudullah becomes the first Bangladesh batsman to score a World Cup ton. Looked to glide this on the off side, and was able to get through for the single after the fumble by the fielder. Lots of emotions on display as he looked to the heavens
fires in a yorker which is dug away to the man at mid-on
short from Broad as Mushfiqur backs away in hopes of punching this, but misses in the end
low full toss which Mushfiqur slams straight to the close-in fielder on the off side
unleashes a full toss which is struck away straight to the fielder at backward point
fires in a wide now outside of off. Looking at the replays for the first ball, this could have been called a no-ball, so Woakes not off to a good start at the moment
tries to once again go after this fuller one, but is late on the delivery
looking for the wide yorker as this one is sent careening to the cover point fielder
struck away now through extra-cover to get Mushfiqur on strike
low full toss which Mushfiqur sees early as he gets low on one knee to heave this sweetly over the deep midwicket boundary

lets go of another full toss which is swatted away instinctively by Mushfiqur, who didn't quite seem to get a hold of it as it fell to the man at long on, but the umpire has the signal for front foot no-ball as no one in the England ranks had picked up on that. Gets a free hit as England thought they may have just plucked a wicket from thin air
fails to do any justice to this free hit as his attempted swat lands near Root at wide long on
goes round the wicket as he fires one on leg which the batsman is late on as the ball ricochets off the pads through gully
bowls a yorker which is flicked away to the fielder at long leg
slower ball on middle and leg which he tried to pummel over the leg side, but ends up mishitting the ball away towards midwicket
tries to glide away a single through third man, with Mahmudullah, who looks a bit tired out there, late as he tried to get to the striker's end, with the throw knocking down the stumps well in time
gets away a clip through fine leg as the acres of space on offer allows them to return back for the second
guides away this back of a length through the third man region to end the over
able to ease away a single on the off side with soft hands
looks to be fancy as he tries to ramp this over the keeper's head, before getting this away through backward square in the end after not turning the face properly
belts this length delivery to the man at a deepish mid-on, who is able to stop this with a dive
overpitched on middle and leg as Mushfiqur sends this back with a powerful, low bludgeon through long on which beats the boundary rider to the rope, despite him putting in the dive
strikes away this fuller one outside off, but straight to the bowler
this time targets the fielder near cow corner to end the over
helps away this back of a length on the pads through backward square
tries to carve away a single through cover point, but hits it a bit too well to the fielder
advances down before clubbing this shortish length from Broad away over midwicket for half a dozen
delivers a slower ball now which is just about turned away to the leg side for a single

Mushfiqur's innings comes to c lose as this slow, off-cutter from Broad ends up being sliced over to Jordan on the ring at cover, who is able to get under it safely. Falls just eleven short of what would have been a second Bangladesh World Cup ton
slaps away this length delivery outside off towards the boundary rider at sweeper cover
delivers a full delivery just outside of off which the batsman elects to leave alone in the end
straighter from Jordan as Sabbir can do no better than just dig this one out
tries to scythe away this fuller one, but is once more late on it
digs away a single now through mid-on as Jordan fires in another useful inswinging yorker
fires this one well wide of off, with the umpire swiveling round to signal the scorers
fires in a full delivery on middle and leg which follows the batsman as he backed away to create room

Morgan backpeddles at mid-off to take this miscued scoop from Sabbir, who was looking to hit it more through long on. Good finish here for England  so far as they look to curb the run-rate towards the end of this innings
able to work away a single towards point as he hares down to the other end
fortune favours the brave as he looks to tonk one over long off, with this one swirling away in the end towards deep extra-cover, before trickling over the rope
gets away a clip to deep midwicket, but is restricted to just the single
wants two from the get-go as he steers one away through the leg side, with the flat throw from the deep at fine leg unable to produce a run out
reaches out to this full delivery outside off, with the keeper taking this from behind. The batsman decide to run for it anyways, and are able to get through despite a shy at the stumps

slower ball on the stumps which he looked to dispatch over cow corner, but only succeeds in getting an inside-edge through fine leg to the keeper. Not called a bye so he definitely got some bat on it.
